title: ReViewView - Feedback Manager
description:
Analyse your Apps ratings & reviews and keep them front and center on your home screen.
Add the App Store or Google Play Store app you want to monitor directly from the Browser or store page.
Never miss a review with the handy read marker.
Stay conscious of your user feedback. Share insights with your development team.
No subscription and no in-app purchase. Use all available features after a one time purchase.
ReViewView is your easy to use solution to analyze App Store ratings & reviews.
